text: To be honest I didn't enjoy my work experiences either :joy: its definitely still a good experience to talk about as you can put a positive spin on it and say that you looking after the kids demonstrated leadership and responsibility :+1: I think if you are good at working independently and a hard worker a lab based role would definitely be a good thing to try! I completely understand the lack of confidence I used to be incredibly shy too (and still am to an extent). With those things its definitely practice talking to new people and putting yourself outside of your comfort zone a bit. Even just pretending you're confident and forcing yourself to talk to new people.. Would you say you ever have a leadership-type role with friends?
